0w0Demonic/AquaHotkey.description: Class prototyping library for AutoHotkey v2.

Cebolla/Monitor.description: This class provides methods for obtaining information about monitor size, dimensions, position, and DPI.

Descolada/JAB.description: Java Access Bridge library to automate Java applications interfaces

Descolada/Media.description: Implements UWP Media Control, allowing access and control of the playing media (but not any media, only UWP ones that are notified by a tray tip with the play-pause buttons and playing song title)

Descolada/Misc.description: Miscallaneous useful functions such as Range, RegExMatchAll, Highlight, WinGetInfo, GetCaretPos, ConvertWinPos, etc

Descolada/OCR.description: OCR library using Windows' built-in UWP OCR capabilities

Descolada/UIA.description: An AutoHotkey v2 wrapper for the UIAutomation framework, which can be used to automate windows that normally might be difficult or impossible to automate with AHK

Descolada/UIA_Browser.description: An addon for Descolada/UIA library to simplify automating browsers via UIA

Descolada/WinEvent.description: Can be used to monitor for window events such as close, open, minimize etc

FanaticGuru/GuiButtonIcon.description: A function that allows an icon to be assigned to a Gui Button using the button's hwnd to identify the button

FanaticGuru/GuiResizer.description: A class to simplify adjusting GUI controls to GUI resizing

FanaticGuru/SpellCurrency.description: A function to convert a number to currency words

Flipeador/WinCloseEx.description: Close a window with different methods

G33kDude/HashMap.description: Provides a hash map based alternative implementation of AutoHotkey's Map class, with the goal of allowing drop-in replacement for situations where the native Map's performance limitations have been reached

G33kDude/Neutron.description: Neutron provides a powerful set of tools for build HTML-based user interfaces with AutoHotkey. It leverages the Trident engine, known for its use in Internet Explorer, because of its deep integration with the Microsoft Windows operating system and its wide availability across systems.

GroggyOtter/AHK-v2-AutoUpdater.description: Class object that will notify you of AHKv2 updates and ask if you'd like to download the new version.

GroggyOtter/JavaScriptStrings.description: Adds JavaScript-style string functionality to AHK v2 strings.

GroggyOtter/Peep.description: Easily get information from nested objects.

GroggyOtter/jsongo.description: Full JSON support for AHKv2 written natively in AHK.

Hellbent/Glyphs.description: Render multi-color text in AHK GUIs with support for gradients, shadows, and advanced formatting

Hellbent/PopupWindow.description: Simplifies the process of working with layered windows

Komrad Toast/DLLManager.description: Simplifies DLL file management. Loads your requested DLLs, keeps track of which DLLs are loaded and how many times that DLL has been referenced, and if the reference count on a DLL drops to 0 it is automatically unloaded.

MrDoge/MemoryModule.description: Include a .dll into a compiled .exe and then load the .dll and use it without having to extract the .dll

MrDoge/SH_Watcher.description: Monitors for folder changes based on an event-driven method.

MrDoge/VD.description: Control and move windows between virtual desktops. Warning: this library uses an undocumented Windows API, which has a real chance of breaking in the future. In such a case the library will need to be updated to accommodate.

MrDoge/sqlite.description: Wrapper for SQLite, which implements a small, fast, self-contained, high-reliability, full-featured, SQL database engine

Qriist/LibQurl.description: A full libcurl wrapper for AHKv2

RaptorX/SQLite.description: Wrapper for SQLite, which implements a small, fast, self-contained, high-reliability, full-featured, SQL database engine

Ruevil2/ADOSQL.description: Wraps the utility of ADODB to connect to a database, submit a query, and read the resulting recordset

SKAN/ListBuffer.description: UI as a function to view/search binary content, up to few MB's

SKAN/MapFile.description: Maps a view of a file object (Parameter FileObj) into the address space of AutoHotkey process

SKAN/MonitorFind.description: Enumerates a list (database) of plugged-in monitors

SKAN/PathX.description: PathX() is an alternative solution for SplitPath(). It breaks down a fullpath to individual parts and returns them as an object.

SKAN/RunCMD.description: Run a program in windowless mode and capture its output

SKAN/ToggleSound.description: Toggle between audio devices using their names or IDs

Spawnova/ShinsImageScanClass.description: Search for images and pixels extremely fast and also with background window support

Spawnova/ShinsOverlayClass.description: A Direct2D overlay, made to be user friendly and fast.

Tebayaki/HotGestures.description: This is a light Autohotkey library for mouse gestures creating and recognizing. It helps you to customize any one-stroke pattern and bind it to any function.

The-CoDingman/WebViewToo.description: Allows for use of the WebView2 Framework within AHK to create Web-based GUIs

The-CoDingman/gToolTip.description: Class for creating ToolTips that can be clicked, dragged, and customized by font and color

TheArkive/CliSAK.description: CLI class: easy one-time and streaming output that collects stdOut and stdErr, and allows writing to stdIn

TheArkive/WinClipAPI.description: Base class for the WinClip library

Tigerlily/MonitorFind.description: Wrapper for monitor configuration WinAPI functions, get and set monitor properties (brightness etc)

scripts.postdownload:
A_WorkingDir := A_Args[1]
FileAppend('`n#include JUnit.ahk`n#include OutputDebug.ahk`n#include Stdout.ahk`n#include Window.ahk', 'Yunit.ahk')

anonymous1184/GetUrl.description: Get the current URL from a browser window

burque505/JartePlus.description: A library to automate Jarte Plus

cyruz/ConfMan.description: Ini files management class, implementing an object central storage and an interface dealing with the underlined classes

cyruz/StdoutToVar.description: Runs a command line program and returns its output

devPnal/EveryHangul.description: Library for processing the Korean alphabet, "Hangul".

emliberace/MIDI.description: The MIDIv2 library grants MIDI functionality to AutoHotKey v2. Send and receive MIDI in your AHK scripts with ease.

evilC/AutoHotInterception.description: AutoHotInterception (AHI) allows you to execute AutoHotkey code in response to events from a specific keyboard or mouse, whilst (optionally) blocking the native functionality (i.e. stopping Windows from seeing that keyboard or mouse event).
evilC/AutoHotInterception.license: MIT; Interception driver: LGPL for non-commercial, custom license for commercial use

scripts.postdownload:
A_WorkingDir := A_Args[1]
Download("https://github.com/oblitum/Interception/releases/latest/download/Interception.zip", "Interception.zip")
DirCopy "Interception.zip", "Interception", true
FileCopy('Interception\Interception\library\x64\interception.dll', 'AHK v2\Lib\x64\interception.dll', true)
FileCopy('Interception\Interception\library\x86\interception.dll', 'AHK v2\Lib\x86\interception.dll', true)
FileMove('Common\Lib\AutoHotInterception.dll', 'AHK v2\Lib\AutoHotInterception.dll', true)
FileMove('Interception\Interception\command line installer\install-interception.exe', 'AHK v2\Lib\install-interception.exe')
if !(FileExist('C:\Windows\System32\drivers\mouse.sys') && FileExist('C:\Windows\System32\drivers\keyboard.sys')) {
MsgBox('Preparing to run the Interception driver installer.`nReboot your computer after installation.`n`nPress OK to continue', 'Notice', 'Iconi')
RunWait '*RunAs "AHK v2\Lib\install-interception.exe" /install',, 'Hide'
}
DirDelete('Interception', true)
DirDelete('Common', true)
RunWait 'powershell.exe -windowstyle hidden -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File "' A_WorkingDir '\AHK v2\Lib\Unblocker.ps1"',, 'Hide'
ExitApp
scripts.preinstall: ExitApp((FileExist('C:\Windows\System32\drivers\mouse.sys') && FileExist('C:\Windows\System32\drivers\keyboard.sys')) ? 0 : (MsgBox('This package requires installing the Interception driver, which requires administrator access and must be used cautiously as not to disable certain key combinations such as Ctrl+Alt+Delete. Are you sure you want to continue?', 'Warning', 'YesNo Icon!') = 'Yes') ? 0 : 1)
scripts.preremove:
A_WorkingDir := A_Args[1]
if !(FileExist('C:\Windows\System32\drivers\mouse.sys') && FileExist('C:\Windows\System32\drivers\keyboard.sys')) || !FileExist('AHK v2\Lib\install-interception.exe')
ExitApp
if MsgBox('Do you wish to uninstall the Interception driver?`nThis requires Administator privileges and a reboot after uninstalling.', 'Uninstall Interception', 'YesNo Icon?') = 'Yes'
RunWait('*RunAs "AHK v2\Lib\install-interception.exe" /uninstall',,'Hide')
ExitApp

evilC/InterceptionTapHoldManager.description: A patch for TapHoldManager that allows it to be used with the Interception driver. See main description under evilC/TapHoldManager

evilC/TapHoldManager.description: An AutoHotkey library that allows you to map multiple actions to one key using a tap-and hold system. Long press / Tap / Multi Tap / Tap and Hold / Multi Tap and Hold etc are all supported.

thqby/NTL.description: NTL is a high-performance, portable C++ library providing data structures and algorithms for manipulating signed, arbitrary length integers, and for vectors, matrices, and polynomials over the integers and over finite fields.

thqby/child_process.description: Create a child process, and read stdout/stderr asynchronously, supporting multiple stdin inputs

thqby/ctypes.description: Create struct, union, array and pointer bindings, and use it like an AHK object

thqby/import_v1lib.description: Import AHK v1 library to v2: call v1 functions and classes, read and modify global variables.

thqby/wincapture.description: wincapture contains 3 types of windows capture, as well as waiting for screen changes, bitmap grayscale, binarization, colors search and picture search.

thqby/windows.description: Alternative to thqby/winrt (provides an alternative entry point for the system-defined WinRT classes). Provides an AutoHotkey v2 "language projection" for the Windows Runtime (WinRT). In other words, it hides the details of interop between AutoHotkey and WinRT, allowing WinRT objects to be used like native AutoHotkey objects.

thqby/winrt.description: Provides an AutoHotkey v2 "language projection" for the Windows Runtime (WinRT). In other words, it hides the details of interop between AutoHotkey and WinRT, allowing WinRT objects to be used like native AutoHotkey objects.

xroot/Array2Buffer.description: A simple way to create a buffer (eg Win32 data structure) from a 2D-array containing the data and type.

Komrad Toast/Cursor.description: Setting cursors, loading cursors from file (.bmp / .ico / .cur / .ani), programmatically creating custom cursors, turning on trails and shadows, setting the cursor bounding rectangle, and more can be accomplished with this class
